mpmToolbox.gui.mpmEditingTools

Class PlaceAndCreateContextMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPopupMenu
            • com.alee.laf.menu.WebPopupMenu
              • mpmToolbox.gui.mpmEditingTools.PlaceAndCreateContextMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.alee.managers.language.LanguageEventMethods, com.alee.managers.language.LanguageMethods, com.alee.managers.settings.SettingsMethods, com.alee.managers.style.Styleable, com.alee.utils.swing.extensions.FontMethods<com.alee.laf.menu.WebPopupMenu>, com.alee.utils.swing.extensions.MethodExtension, com.alee.utils.swing.extensions.SizeMethods<com.alee.laf.menu.WebPopupMenu>, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class PlaceAndCreateContextMenu
extends com.alee.laf.menu.WebPopupMenu
    A popup menu to be used in class ScoreDisplayPanel. The menu is used to create and/or place performance instructions via clicking on the score page.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        position -
